start.content:
#!/bin/sh
#sleep 500
if ! test -f /home/app/.have_profile
 then
  pip install -U jsonschema --user
  pip install "ipython[notebook]" --user
  /home/app/.local/bin/ipython2 profile create nbserver
  touch /home/app/.have_profile
  cd /home/app

  /home/app/.local/bin/ipython2 profile create nbserver

  pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
  passwd('_Engines_Environment(notebook_password)')
  exit() " | /home/app/.local/bin/ipython2  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 | sed "/.*sha/s//\'sha/"`
  cat ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
  cp /tmp/confg ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
fi

PID_FILE=/tmp/ipython_notebook.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/system_functions.sh
host=`hostname`
ip=`grep $Hostname /etc/hosts |cut -f1 `
result=`/home/app/.local/bin/jupyter-notebook   --ip=$ip --NotebookApp.password=$pass --config ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py &`
pid=$!

echo $result

echo $result |grep token= > /tmp/first_run_url

echo $pid >$PID_FILE
startup_complete
wait
shutdown_complete
sleep 500
exit
